name: Tower Climber (itch) (Chris_05)
description:
Tower Climber is a RPG Puzzle game that Challenges the player to look close and combine good common sense to solve the puzzles and reach the top. There are many paths to the top so feel free to give it a couple of try's.

New content coming very soon!

If you like what you see please donate, it supports the game a lot an will make the content even better!

For the final version of the game we plan to have a full 4 towers filled with pixel art more puzzle and rewards.

Planend Release of Alpha 1:  19.April 2020  (19.04.2020)

If you download the game and windows in not allowing you to install the game klick on further information and then klick on execute anyway. (It is fully save)
